title: GitTogether Hyderabad
description:
IMPORTANT: **Meetup RSVP is not considered as registration.** Please register at **[gittogethers.github.io](http://gittogethers.github.io/)** by **12 PM IST on 22nd May**. Confirmed participants will receive an email by the end of the same day. Only confirmed participants will be granted entry to the venue, and we are unable to make any exceptions. We appreciate your understanding and cooperation.

\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-

**Theme: AI Agents and the MCP (Model Context Protocol) Paradigm**

Join us for this half-day meetup packed with insights, inspiration, and networking! Sharpen your tech skills and discover incredible open-source projects. What to expect:

* **Tech Sessions**: Dive into the latest open-source technologies with talks by experienced developers. Expand your knowledge and toolkit!
* **Community Spotlight**: Discover a hidden gem! One lucky participant gets to showcase a cool open-source project they've built. Could it be you?

\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-

**Agenda**

* 9:30 AM to 10:00 AM: **Registration and Networking**
* 10:00 AM to 10:10 AM: **git init (Welcome Note)**
* 10:10 AM to 10:40 AM: **Demystifying AI Agents: A Beginners Guide by** [Prathap Chandra](https://github.com/Prathap-Chandra)
* 10:40 AM to 11:10 AM: **AI Agents with APIs: Create a Multi-Tool Assistant** **by** [Venkat Jogi](https://www.linkedin.com/in/venkatrj/)
* 11:10 AM to 11:30 AM: **Break and Networking**
* 11:30 AM to 12:00 PM: **Community** **Spotlight (**[Submit for Spotlight](https://gh.io/spotlight)**)**
* 12:00 PM to 12:45 PM: **When Copilot Codes Who Audits? A Guide to Safe AI Adoption by** [Sai Bhavan Narayan](https://github.com/saiinfy)
* 12:45 PM to 1:00 PM: **git merge (Closing Note)**

\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-

**Date**: Saturday 24th May, 2025

**Time**: 9:30 AM to 1:00 PM IST

**Venue**: [Tech Mahindra Learning World, Jubilee Enclave, Hitech City, Hyderabad, Telangana](https://maps.app.goo.gl/g7Ggf9gcVsu3zmuv8), Gate No-3, TMLW-Ganga, Yamuna, Sarasvati conference room 1st floor

For any queries, please contact [Tanmaiyee Vadloori](https://github.com/Tanmaiyee-Vadloori), Community Volunteer at GitTogether Hyderabad or write to us at meetups@github.com

\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-

**GitTogethers Call for Sessions** üì¢

Are you someone who loves to share your knowledge? Do you have a passion for AI, Developer Experience, or Security?

We're calling for developers to submit their session proposals for upcoming GitTogether events! [Submit your proposal here](https://gh.io/cfs).

\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-

**Community Spotlight** üí°

Are you passionate about open-source development and have a project you'd love to share? We're looking for developers like you for spotlight at our upcoming GitTogethers. [Submit your projects here](https://gh.io/spotlight).

venues.name: Tech Mahindra Learning World
venues.address: Tower - I & II, Plot No 22 to 34, Jubilee Enclave, HITEC City, Madhapur, Hyderabad, Telangana 500081

title: GitTogether Delhi NCR: GitHub Copilot for Product Managers
description:
**Register for the event:** [https://lu.ma/ty6u5nz0](https://lu.ma/ty6u5nz0)

‚Äã[GitHub](http://startups.github.com/) invites startup Product Managers to an exclusive, invite-only session focused on unlocking the power of AI and agentic workflows to accelerate product development.

‚ÄãThis half-day event features real-world insights from experienced product leaders, a dynamic panel discussion, and a hands-on workshop introducing agentic workflows with GitHub Copilot.

‚ÄãNo coding background needed ‚Äî just a drive to innovate and build smarter.

**Registrations are open:** [https://lu.ma/ty6u5nz0](https://lu.ma/ty6u5nz0)

***

**What You‚Äôll Experience:**

* ‚Äã**Panel Discussion:** Hear from startup Product Managers who are using AI to transform product workflows.
* ‚Äã**Hands-On Workshop:** Learn how to use agentic AI tools to streamline prototyping, collaboration, and execution.
* ‚Äã**AMA with Experts:** Ask your questions and get actionable advice from seasoned product leaders.

***

‚Äã**Who Should Attend:**

* ‚ÄãProduct Managers at Startups
* ‚ÄãStartup Founders involved in product development
* ‚ÄãAspiring PMs and Product Enthusiasts

‚Äã**Limited seats available ‚Äî RSVP now to reserve your spot:** [https://lu.ma/ty6u5nz0](https://lu.ma/ty6u5nz0)

Waitlisting on Meetup will not be considered valid registration for the meetup. Register for the event on [https://lu.ma/ty6u5nz0](https://lu.ma/ty6u5nz0)

Reach out to [@vipulgupta2048 ](https://linkedin.com/in/vipulgupta2048)if you have any questions, are looking to speak, or volunteer for the event.

description:
**‚ö†Ô∏è ATEN√á√ÉO: VOC√ä DEVE SE INSCREVER UNICAMENTE [CLICANDO NESTE FORM](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSeaiP82qLovJqf-aQiXahp0bitItH4pvzSlQFoXxEHe9iMsHA/viewform?usp=sharing)**
**A INSCRI√á√ÉO NO MEETUP N√ÉO CONTA COMO INSCRI√á√ÉO. APENAS NO LINK DO FORMS. ‚ö†Ô∏è**

Todas as informa√ß√µes do evento tamb√©m est√£o no formul√°rio. As inscri√ß√µes se encerram 20/junio/2025 √†s 18h00.
Ap√≥s isso, n√£o ser√° mais poss√≠vel alterar a lista.

**Palestras:**
**Sidecar Architecture: Separando Responsabilidades sem Quebrar a Cabe√ßa** by [Damiana Costa](https://www.linkedin.com/in/damianacosta/)***:*** *O padr√£o arquitetural sidecar se tornou um aliado poderoso em arquiteturas distribu√≠das modernas, especialmente quando precisamos desacoplar responsabilidades como observabilidade, seguran√ßa, comunica√ß√£o e resili√™ncia dos servi√ßos principais. Nesta talk, vamos explorar o que √© a arquitetura sidecar, por que ela surgiu, onde ela realmente brilha ‚Äî e onde complica mais do que ajuda.*

19h45 - 20h15:
**GC Internals: Anatomia de um Garbage Collector Moderno by** [Ren√™ Cardozo](https://www.linkedin.com/in/reneepc/): *Voc√™ sabe o que acontece com a mem√≥ria quando voc√™ deixa de us√°-la? Nessa talk discutiremos o diferentes m√©todos de garbage collection e como funcionam por debaixo dos panos, com uma lupa especial sobre o incrivelmente perform√°tico GC do Go.*
